title: Dude draws New Yorker cover w/ iPhone app. Illustrators everywhere are crying.
content:
Dude draws New Yorker cover with an iPhone app [Brushes](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013091020/http:/bnsn.com/Lc). Illustrators everywhere are crying.

[![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013091020im_/http:/www.creativereview.co.uk/images/uploads/2009/05/newyorker_0.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013091020/http:/bnsn.com/2z)

See more artwork at [Creative Review](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013091020/http:/bnsn.com/2z).
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content:
[Jorge Colombo "worked as an illustrator, as a photographer, and a graphic designer"](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013091020/http:/www.jorgecolombo.com/about/index.htm) _before_ getting an iPhone, too. ;-)

[http://www.jorgecolombo.com/drawings/index.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013091020/http:/www.jorgecolombo.com/drawings/index.htm "http://www.jorgecolombo.com/drawings/index.htm")

[http://www.jorgecolombo.com/photos/index.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013091020/http:/www.jorgecolombo.com/photos/index.htm "http://www.jorgecolombo.com/photos/index.htm")
